Basic controls



unsigned int n_vertices = 4
 Number of vertices in the graph.
unsigned int n_edges = 2*n_vertices
 Number of edges in the graph.
unsigned int source_strength = 500
 Source strenght.
BigFloat uncertainty_in_potentials = 0.00001
 This specifies the error we allow for the values of the vertex potentials.

Detailed Description

This sub-module groups together all graph specific program controls including a large number of useful or at least necessary typedefs.
